about.intro: I was born in this beautiful port town Massawa.

body.bio: I develop web sites and web applications using industry grade technologies and practicies. I am passionate about learning new technology and expanding my knowlege. I'm married and a proud father, I enjoy listening to jazz while programming, Love to draw and paint and can cook.
body.edu: Originally trained as Marine Biotechnology  at University of Asmara, later on switched a career to follow my passion in Tech and the world of programming.
body.reason: I have always being enthusiastic and passionate about technology having found an opportunity to follow what makes me happy

about.current: I am trained Full Stack Web Developer living close to London

home.intro: Welcome Home is where heart is
home.body: This is where I plan to put stories
